about_us_text: On Wasl Chiraa refugees find real free gift vouchers for goods, services and events to support the start of their new life in Europe. Expect vouchers for cinemas, soccer club memberships, your local ice-cream parlor, a language-learning app, opticians, and many more.
approve_new_vouchers: We'll approve your new vouchers within 24 hours.
approve_updated_vouchers: We'll approve your update within 24 hours.
categories_info_text: All voucher categories of Wasl Chiraa. Create new categories here.
copyright: 2015 by Wasl Chiraa. All rights reserved.
email_expired_content: Your voucher reservation is expired. Vouchers can be reserved only for 24h. Head to http://www.waslchiraa.com and look for new vouchers!
merchants_how_it_works_text: In the Wasl Chiraa Merchant Web-App you can create and edit vouchers and see reservations for offers that are currently running.
privacy_text: Wasl Chiraa respects you privacy, we only use data that is needed for making our services work.
title: Title
users_info_text: All user accounts of Wasl Chiraa. Create new users here.
verify_refugee_text: Please verify the refugee by means of any official document that proofs his/her status as refugee.
voucher_offline: Your voucher will be offline until verified!
vouchers_info_text: All vouchers of Wasl Chiraa. Create and/or publish new vouchers here.
reserve_notice:
You need to redeem this voucher within 24h. Can you do this?

You will receive a email with the voucher code at the specified address
__email__

Please make sure to bring you documents!
reserve_unregistered_notice:
You need an account to reserve a voucher!

Please login or create a new account!
redeem_voucher_notice:
1. Check valid documents

2. Plese enter the code provided by the refugee
email_registration_welcometext: Welcome to waslchiraa! Klick the button to finish registration.
email_forgot_password_text: To rest you password, click on the button below and complete process in our app.
